div.style: font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; border: 1px solid #007ACC; padding: 25px; max-width: 600px; background-color: #ffffff; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
display: flex; align-items: center; border-bottom: 3px solid #007ACC; padding-bottom: 15px;

div.p: Senior Software Engineer | Cloud & DevOps Specialist
Results-driven Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable applications. Proven ability to lead projects and mentor junior developers.

h3.style: border-bottom: 2px solid #007ACC; padding-bottom: 8px; margin-top: 25px; font-size: 1.4em; color: #333;

div.p:
Innovatech Solutions - Senior Software Developer
2020 - Present
- Led the development of a microservices-based architecture, improving system scalability by 40%.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time by 75%.

h3.style: border-bottom: 2px solid #007ACC; padding-bottom: 8px; margin-top: 25px; font-size: 1.4em; color: #333;

div.p:
Languages: Java, Python, Go
Cloud: AWS, Azure
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform
